post.title: why i love Linux
post.body: linux is a free open source project there for you can make your own OS if you if you know how to also you really dont have to worry as much when it comes to viruses how ever when it comes to root kits you may want to be careful about that it is also very easy to compile git hub projects in linux i have no need to install git bash but you do have to install git and i dont have to go fishing for drivers every thing just works out of the box well some times you do but most of the time you dont have to worry about that unless your using debian some other disro

post.title: well now that i have my blog setup
post.body: i think i should add some contact info wile im at it i mostly use bitmessage as my email even though i have a zeromail im also on Ring and Tox i will give you those later and if you like my blog feel free to donate some bitcoins
